thread.section_title: Goldline Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goldline | www.goldline.com | 5 of 183
thread.title: Virgil C.

author: Virgil C.
title: Virgil C.
text:
There has always been respect give by me when I discuss a purchase and respect has always been returned from Goldline account exec. I don't need to be talked into a purchase. I appreciate the input from the executive when I ask a question. Obviously, my mind is made up when I call but still like to here what the executive has to say. The professional discussion is appreciated.
Regards.
